synopsis:
Alongside the 12 Pretty Cure, let's all bring about a miracle!!

I'm Nono Hana! Today was supposed to be the day where I take Hugtan to a field of alpine flowers for the first timeâ™ª but, suddenly a rampaging monster known as Usobakka appeared to spread lies all over the world! On top of that, I got separated from Saaya and Homare! Big shock! Furthermore, "Pretty Cure A La Mode" and "Mahou Tsukai Pretty Cure!" are being targeted...we gotta hurry and find everyone!
When you break a "promise", don't you become a "liar"?

And that's when, I remembered. I made a promise I couldn't keep with a young mysterious boy known as Clover. And now, I have to make sure I convey my feelings properly! While also protecting the world with the senior Pretty Cure! 

(Source: Pretty Cure Wiki)
